objects.specification: A rectangular wooden floor covering the entire classroom area with natural light wood tones. The floor consists of long plank boards with subtle grain texture and a smooth matte finish to evoke a warm, inviting atmosphere.
A neutral off-white matte-painted wall section with a smooth, slightly textured finish. It has a clean, minimalistic style without adornments, forming part of the enclosing classroom structure.
A neutral off-white matte-painted wall section with a smooth, slightly textured finish. It has a clean, minimalistic style without adornments, forming part of the enclosing classroom structure.

A large rectangular window with a crisp white frame and clear glass panes to admit natural light. The design is modern and simple, complementing the neutral wall.
Semi-transparent light gray cotton fabric curtains with gentle folds and a subtle drape. The curtains add a soft, homey touch to the window.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white writing surface and slim aluminum frame. The board is magnetic and has a clean, modern design suitable for daily classroom use.

A spacious teacher's desk crafted from dark walnut wood. It features a thick rectangular top with a polished matte finish and sturdy square legs, offering a professional and elegant focal point at the front of the room.

A compact student desk with a light oak wood tabletop featuring straight edges and a smooth finish. It is supported by slender matte black metal legs, conveying a minimalist, functional school furniture aesthetic.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a white plastic housing, rounded corners, and a forward-facing lens. The design is sleek and minimalist with subtle ventilation slots.
A tall wooden bookshelf made of medium tone oak with five open shelves. The compartments display rows of colorful book spines for a cozy, scholarly atmosphere.
A circular analog wall clock with a white face, black numerals and hands, and a thin silver frame. The design is simple and easy to read from anywhere in the room.
A small indoor potted plant featuring glossy green leaves in a compact arrangement. The planter is a neutral matte ceramic pot for a subtle touch of greenery.
A flush-mounted rectangular LED panel light with a white diffused cover and slim profile. The fixture provides even, soft illumination in a modern style.
